keyMoments.title: Breed's Devil Fruit Weakness Revealed
keyMoments.description: Law reveals that Breed's Peto Peto no Mi control only works if victims can actually hear his voice commands.
keyMoments.significance: This discovery becomes the key to defeating Breed and freeing all enslaved animals.

keyMoments.title: Self-Enhancement Backfires
keyMoments.description: Breed uses his Devil Fruit power on himself to enhance his strength, but loses control over his enslaved animals as a result.
keyMoments.significance: Breed's desperation and over-reliance on his power leads directly to his defeat.

keyMoments.title: Breed's Defeat
keyMoments.description: Luffy and the Kung-fu Dugong deliver a combined punch that defeats Breed and ends his reign of terror.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the end of the Caesar Retrieval Arc and frees all of Breed's victims.

abilities.description: Breed can create green gel collars that force victims to obey his voice commands.
Breed can use his Devil Fruit power on himself to enhance his physical strength and muscle mass.

relationships.description: Breed enslaved the Kung-fu Dugong and the Sea Animal Pirates using his Devil Fruit powers.

evolutionMoments.description: The Kung-fu Dugong breaks free and helps defeat Breed.

relationships.description: Breed attempted to control Luffy with his Devil Fruit but was outsmarted and ultimately defeated by him.

evolutionMoments.description: Luffy defeats Breed with help from the Kung-fu Dugong.

reveals.information: Peto Peto no Mi requires victims to hear his voice to obey commands
Can use Peto Peto no Mi on himself for physical enhancement

keyMoments.title: Breaking Free from Control
keyMoments.description: The Kung-fu Dugong and other enslaved animals break free from Breed's control through sheer willpower and work together to restrain him.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates growth in strength and willpower since the Alabasta arc.

keyMoments.title: Reunited Victory with Luffy
keyMoments.description: The Kung-fu Dugong teams up with Luffy to deliver the finishing blow to Breed, showing how much he has grown since their first meeting.
keyMoments.significance: A triumphant reunion showcasing the Dugong's development into a capable pirate captain who learned from Luffy's example.

keyMoments.title: Farewell to Luffy
keyMoments.description: The Kung-fu Dugong and his Sea Animal Pirates say goodbye to Luffy and continue their own journey as free pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the lasting impact of Luffy's influence from the Alabasta arc and the Dugong's commitment to his own pirate journey.

abilities.description: The Kung-fu Dugong learned to use Armament Haki during the timeskip, coating his flippers in the black hardening.
Combat techniques learned from observing and training with Luffy during the Alabasta arc.

relationships.description: The Kung-fu Dugong was trained by Luffy in Alabasta and was inspired to become a pirate, forming his own crew during the timeskip.

evolutionMoments.description: Reunites with Luffy and fights alongside him to defeat Breed before continuing his own journey.

relationships.description: The Kung-fu Dugong and his crew were enslaved by Breed using the Peto Peto no Mi.

evolutionMoments.description: Breaks free from Breed's control and helps defeat him.

reveals.information: Learned Armament Haki during the timeskip
Formed the Sea Animal Pirates and reached the New World

keyMoments.title: Combined Attack with Kung-fu Dugong
keyMoments.description: Luffy teams up with his old friend from Alabasta to deliver a decisive blow to Breed.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Luffy's ability to inspire and fight alongside those he's influenced, even years after their first meeting.

keyMoments.title: Farewell to Sea Animal Pirates
keyMoments.description: Luffy says goodbye to the Kung-fu Dugong and his crew after freeing them from Breed's control.
keyMoments.significance: A touching reunion showing the lasting impact of Luffy's kindness and inspiration from the Alabasta arc.

name.japanese: トラファルガー・D・ワーテル・ロー

keyMoments.title: Law Reveals Breed's Weakness
keyMoments.description: Law uses his analytical skills to discover and explain the weakness of Breed's Devil Fruit power, revealing he pretended to be controlled.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Law's tactical intelligence and his value as an ally to the Straw Hats.
keyMoments.quote: The victims must be able to hear and comprehend the command for it to take effect.
